QuestData.Title: Li Li's Day Off
QuestData.Description: Uncle Chen asked me not to get into any fights while he was away... but that doesn't mean I can't go exploring. Finally, a chance to look around Pandaria without stopping every forty-seven steps for another rest!$b$bYou want to come with me? I'll bet there's all kinds of cool places we can visit, not too far away from here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Li Li to the Silken Fields, New Cifera, and Huangtze Falls.
QuestData.RewardText: That was great! You and I should go exploring again sometime.$b$bAnd it looks like we finished before Uncle Chen got back, too. Perfect.

Objectives.Objective: Bring Li Li to the Silken Fields
Bring Li Li to New Cifera
Bring Li Li to Huangtze Falls
